nodes.text: Papa was a Hutt male who was the father of crime lord Ziro Desilijic Tiure and the husband of Mama the Hutt.

The Hutt left his wife, ostensibly without her knowing it, and she never knew that he had died. When he died, he was buried on the planet Teth. His grave concealed a holodiary containing incriminating information about the Hutt Grand Council's illegal activities. When Ziro and Sy Snootles traveled to Teth to retrieve the holodiary, Snootles betrayed and killed Ziro, taking the holodiary with her and turning it over to Ziro's nephew, Jabba Desilijic Tiure.
